alert.note: Alert for Coconino (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued July 31 at 1:50PM MST until July 31 at 4:00PM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 PM MST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall. * WHERE...A portion of north central Arizona, including the following county, Coconino. * WHEN...Until 400 PM MST. * IMPACTS...Flooding of creeks and normally dry washes is imminent or occurring. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 149 PM MST, Heavy rain that fell on Saturday caused a rise at the gauge near Tuba City on the Moenkopi Wash. Flooding is currently ongoing near Tuba City. - This includes the following creeks, washes and rivers... Moenkopi Wash, Fivemile Wash and Hamblin Wash. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Tuba City, Moenkopi and Navajo Reservation. - This includes the following highways... Highway 160 between mile markers 315 and 326. State Route 264 between mile markers 322 and 325. - Visit www.weather.gov/safety/flood for more information on flood safety.
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
